col3: I grew up in Briançon (1993-2009), and moved for my studies afterward: for my Prep' School at Lycée Thiers in Marseille (2009-11), then B.Sc. and two M.Sc. at ENS Cachan near Paris (2011-16), and currently my Ph.D. at CentraleSupélec at Rennes and Lille (since 2016).

Torino a few times in 1999, 2003 and 2007, and a week of holidays in Toscany in 2016.
My friends and I especially loved the city of Pisa.
1 month in 2005 in Norwalk, CT to visit my aunt.

1 week in Quebec in 2005 to visit a cousin with my aunt.
Very good memories from Quebec!

Valencia in 2005, Barcelona in 2009 and 2013 for holidays, and Cadiz in 2016 for the Machine Learning Summer School.
Cadiz and Sevilla are lovely cities! Hooray to Spain!
I went back for two conferences in Spain in 2018, one week in Lanzarote for ALT 2018, and one week in Barcelona for IEEE WCNC 2018.
1 week in Cork and south of Ireland in 2006 for a school trip.
A one-day visit at Saarbrücken University in 2011, and a week in Berlin in 2013 for holidays.
A week in Stockholm in 2009, for a research collaboration with the French Highschool in Stockholm, for a «Math.en.Jeans» project on tropical geometry.

A week-end trip in 2013.
Not so interesting... It looks like Paris, only more expensive. And smaller.

3 months in 2013 for a research internship at University College of London (UCL) in London, with Peter O'Hearn and Jules Villard. See my report.Living in London was fun, and it's surely an interesting city, but it's way too large and crowded for me...
I'm going to Scotland for holidays in August 2018!

Two semesters in 2014-2015 as a teaching assistant at Mahindra Ecole Centrale in Hyderabad, taught about 280 hours of first-year of bachelor mathematics and computer science.
It was an awesome experience!! See the resources I wrote for the CS101 course.

3 weeks in 2015, camping and hitchhiking all around the south coast of Iceland.
It was magical! See here some pictures!

A few days in 2003, and 5 months in 2016 for a research internship at EPFL in Lausanne with Michael Unser and Julien Fageot, for the 'MVA' M.Sc. in data science and mathematics. See my research report.
I ranked first to this well-known French M.Sc.! Lausanne is a lovely city!

4 days in Budapest in 2016, for holidays.
I loved this city!

4 days in Vienna in 2016, for holidays.
Not so special... Looks like Paris, but colder and more expensive!

10 days in Athens, Delphi and Corinth in 2017 for holidays.
It was really great! The citadel of Corinth is a very cool place...
1 day in Brussels in 2017.Too short to say anything...

1 week in 2017 Amsterdam for the 30th Conference On Learning Theory (COLT) for my Ph.D., and a few days in 2018 in Rotterdam for a research workshop.
I liked Amsterdam very much! So beautiful and calm!

1 week in Lisboa for the CROWNCom 2017 conference for my Ph.D..
I went to present this poster and my first research article, which received the CROWNCom 2017 Best Paper Award !
A few days in Rabat then a week in Marrakech, for the IEEE WCNC 2019 conference. I loved the trip!
